neighbors.claims: Doris Gossett Williams Bratcher is a long-time local resident; she was noted as the wife of the late William “Red” Bratcher of Skyland Drive in Belton ([www.legacy.com](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/indexjournal/name/william-bratcher-obituary?id=34912732#:~:text=Belton%20William%20,late%20Raymond%20and%20Elizabeth%20Brock)).
